alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Sanpete Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 3:50PM MST until January 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 2 inches through Saturday morning, 1 to 4 inches Saturday afternoon through Monday morning. * WHERE...Eastern Juab/Millard Counties and Sanpete Valley. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are possible, especially along higher passes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Sanpete Valley
